events.name: Tuesday 31st March
events.description: Our goal is to make the Ruby on Rails community in Singapore more inclusive for women and other minorities - so if you know anyone that codes or that you think would enjoy learning to code, invite them along! Bring a computer! (It's interactive)

events.name: ASP.NET 5 and Windows 10 First Look on .NET Meetup
events.description: Hi all, We will be having a Special End of March meetup due to the release of new .NET related stuff like Visual Studio 2015 CTP 6 , ASP.NET 5 (MVC 6) , . NET Core , summary news from #dotnetconf and of course Windows 10 Technical Preview Build 10041 development using .NET Framework 4.6 . Join this first lookup meetup so we can share what's is new and how to prepare for the development and of course some demo. Goodies: If you don't want to download Windows 10 Technical Preview Build 10041 ISO and Visual Studio 2015 CTP 6 and the tools for Windows 10, please bring your own 16GB (minimum) thumb drive. I will station my laptop for you to copy those ISO files. Please bring the USB 3.0 thumb drive for fast copying and please make sure your USB thumb drive is clean of viruses and malware. Wi-Fi: Free Food: Available (Thanks to Microsoft Singapore) Door Prize: 2 (two) Sandisk Cruzer Ultra 32 GB USB 3.0 Thumbdrive from unnamed sponsor and 2 (two) Starbucks Card from us (organizer).
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium (Singapore), One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium, Singapore 018989
